text: Hi! Are there ANY simple and secure way - without using a lot of custom code - to get the "record id" of a newly created record in a workflow, to be used further in the code?

Quick Q on custom workflow actions. I'm working on one atm, and regardless of what I do with changing the action, the first version I put up still shows. I also can't delete it, even though all of the test environments have been deleted. It keeps saying that there is one portal left still using it.

Is there any way to get specifics on what portal is still using the action?
